node.name: Arctorus ODS BIRT Emitter
node.shortdescription:
Arctorus Birt Emitters provide unique solution to export Eclipse Birt Reports in Microsoft Office (OpenXML) and OpenOffice/LibreOffice formats. These emitters work side by side with Birt Reporting Engine and transparently make it possible to export Birt Reports in one of these new formats which are not supported by Birt natively:

  • DOCX - Microsoft Word Document (Docx Birt Emitter)
  • XLSX - Microsoft Excel Spreadsheet (Xlsx Birt Emitter)
  • PPTX - Microsoft PowerPoint Presentation (Pptx Birt Emitter)
  • ODT - OpenOffice Writer Document (Odt Birt Emitter)
  • ODS - OpenOffice Calc Spreadsheet (Ods Birt Emitter)
  • ODP - OpenOffice Impress Presentation (Odp Birt Emitter)

What's New:

January 23, 2012 - Arctorus Birt Emitters 4.0.0 Released.

  • Added support for XLS format so now we offer export of BIRT reports to the full range of spreadsheet formats XLS, XLSX and ODS.
  • All spreadsheet cell types String/Number/DateTime/Boolean with any custom formatting are supported now.
  • Highly improved calculation of rows height to fit information to cells.
  • Implemented smart borders rendering when several borders defined for a single cell. For example if different borders are defined for adjacent cells or for a cell and cell's content.
node.body:
Arctorus Birt Emitters provide unique solution to export Eclipse Birt Reports in Microsoft Office (OpenXML) and OpenOffice/LibreOffice formats. These emitters work side by side with Birt Reporting Engine and transparently make it possible to export Birt Reports in one of these new formats which are not supported by Birt natively:

  • DOCX - Microsoft Word Document (Docx Birt Emitter)
  • XLSX - Microsoft Excel Spreadsheet (Xlsx Birt Emitter)
  • PPTX - Microsoft PowerPoint Presentation (Pptx Birt Emitter)
  • ODT - OpenOffice Writer Document (Odt Birt Emitter)
  • ODS - OpenOffice Calc Spreadsheet (Ods Birt Emitter)
  • ODP - OpenOffice Impress Presentation (Odp Birt Emitter)

What's New:

January 23, 2012 - Arctorus Birt Emitters 4.0.0 Released.

  • Added support for XLS format so now we offer export of BIRT reports to the full range of spreadsheet formats XLS, XLSX and ODS.
  • All spreadsheet cell types String/Number/DateTime/Boolean with any custom formatting are supported now.
  • Highly improved calculation of rows height to fit information to cells.
  • Implemented smart borders rendering when several borders defined for a single cell. For example if different borders are defined for adjacent cells or for a cell and cell's content.
